item.title: Hello World
item.description: <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/owl.css"><link rel="stylesheet" class="aplayer-secondary-style-marker" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aplayer@1.10.1/dist/APlayer.min.css"><script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aplayer@1.10.1/dist/APlayer.min.js" class="aplayer-secondary-script-marker"></script><script class="meting-secondary-script-marker" src="/js/Meting.min.js"></script><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/hint.css/2.4.1/hint.min.css">
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start#

Create a new post#

More info: Writing

Run server#

More info: Server

Generate static files#

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites#

More info: Deployment

item.title: Test：Chart
item.content:encoded:
Test: Chart

flowchart#

Plugin: https://github.com/bubkoo/hexo-filter-flowchart

Generate flowchart。

sequence#

Plugin: https://github.com/bubkoo/hexo-filter-sequence

Generate UML sequence diagrams。

Theme Tags#

Next> Mermaid#

Next> Mermaid-doc

Generate diagrams and flowcharts from text

Flowcharts#

doc

Top to bottom

            graph TB            Start --> Stop

Left to right

            graph LR            Start --> Stop

Sequence Diagram#

doc

            sequenceDiagram            Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?John-->>Alice: Great!

Class Diagram#

doc

            classDiagram            Animal <|-- DuckAnimal <|-- FishAnimal <|-- ZebraAnimal : +int ageAnimal : +String genderAnimal: +isMammal()Animal: +mate()class Duck{    +String beakColor    +swim()    +quack()}class Fish{    -int sizeInFeet    -canEat()}class Zebra{    +bool is_wild    +run()}

State Diagram#

doc

            stateDiagram-v2            [*] --> Firststate First {    [*] --> second    second --> [*]}

Gantt#

doc

            gantt            title A Gantt DiagramdateFormat  YYYY-MM-DDsection SectionA task           :a1, 2014-01-01, 30dAnother task     :after a1  , 20dsection AnotherTask in sec      :2014-01-12  , 12danother task     : 24d

Pie#

doc

            pie title Pets adopted by volunteers            "Dogs" : 386"Cats" : 85"Rats" : 15

Reference reading#

item.title: Test：图表
item.description: 语法和插件等项目测试
item.content:encoded:
Test:图表

flowchart#

Plugin: https://github.com/bubkoo/hexo-filter-flowchart

生成流程图。

sequence#

Plugin: https://github.com/bubkoo/hexo-filter-sequence

生成UML序列图。

主题标签#

Next> Mermaid#

Next> Mermaid-doc

从文本生成图表和流程图

流程图#

doc

从上到下

            graph TB            Start --> Stop

从左到右

            graph LR            Start --> Stop

顺序图#

doc

            sequenceDiagram            Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?John-->>Alice: Great!

类图#

doc

            classDiagram            Animal <|-- DuckAnimal <|-- FishAnimal <|-- ZebraAnimal : +int ageAnimal : +String genderAnimal: +isMammal()Animal: +mate()class Duck{    +String beakColor    +swim()    +quack()}class Fish{    -int sizeInFeet    -canEat()}class Zebra{    +bool is_wild    +run()}

状态图#

doc

            stateDiagram-v2            [*] --> Firststate First {    [*] --> second    second --> [*]}

甘特图#

doc

            gantt            title A Gantt DiagramdateFormat  YYYY-MM-DDsection SectionA task           :a1, 2014-01-01, 30dAnother task     :after a1  , 20dsection AnotherTask in sec      :2014-01-12  , 12danother task     : 24d

饼形图#

doc

            pie title Pets adopted by volunteers            "Dogs" : 386"Cats" : 85"Rats" : 15
